brief: Sets a variable within the shader
name: set()
description:
Sets the uniform variables inside the shader to modify the effect while the 
 program is running.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: the name of the uniform variable to modify

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: first component of the variable to modify

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: second component of the variable to modify. The variable has to be declared with an array/vector type in the shader (i.e.: int[2], vec2)

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: third component of the variable to modify. The variable has to be declared with an array/vector type in the shader (i.e.: int[3], vec3)

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: fourth component of the variable to modify. The variable has to be declared with an array/vector type in the shader (i.e.: int[4], vec4)

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: modifies all the components of an array/vector uniform variable. PVector can only be used if the type of the variable is vec3.

parameters.name: ncoords
parameters.description: number of coordinates per element, max 4

parameters.name: tex
parameters.description: sets the sampler uniform variable to read from this image texture
